module.name: Call Flow Control
module.description: Call Flow manual toggle control - allows for two destinations to be chosen and provides a feature code that toggles between the two destinations.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.1* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.2* republished to prune problematic changelog during development *2.10.0.1* #5476, #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #4993 *2.9.0.2* #4740, #4758, #4768 *2.9.0.1* #4651, #4653, #4655 *2.9.0.0* #4636 *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* spelling errors, localizations *2.6.0.2* #3585 custom recordings *2.6.0.1* init tabindex *2.6.0.0* #3650, #3651
